DescriptionData.Title: Dewey's Gospel Clown Skits #1
DescriptionData.Description: The first in Dewey's Gospel Collection, this book contains an assortment of both single and multiple skits. Each skit conveys a strong Christian message. Plenty of fresh, fun, meaningful and workable ideas for your clown ministry. Includes: Gospel Clowning, Be a Clown, Goals, Justification, Code of Ethics, Solo Skits - Steal No More, Hop To Heaven, "I'm Just Trying To Be Good", Grow, Laundry Lesson, - Multiple Clown Skits - Cheap-Skates, X-Ray Machine, Outcast, Palm Reader, Wash Away My Sins. 30 pages, illustrated pamphlet.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes an assortment of both single and multiple performer skits that convey a strong Christian message
New routines for Bible Schools, Sunday School, Witnessing, Mission trips, and more
